ovdesc.p: This is a trigger file which holds the id of CO.ALLOCATION.PARAMETER.
ovdesc.P: All the records of this trigger file is selected and processed by the service CO.REBUILD.ALLOC.PRIORITY.
ovdesc.p: This file will be updated when creation of new record in CO.ALLOCATION.PARAMETER and same record is amended via LIMIT.CHANGE application.

desc.p: SYSTEM - Input can be defined from MASTER company only.
A Valid Customer company (CUS.COMPANY must be same as ID of the company).
